title.rendered: A&A Associate gets featured in Gulf News

content.rendered: A&A Associate was featured in Gulf News, the leading source of regional news and intelligence, serving millions of professionals from the UAE. The organization was featured in the news – “UAE businesses start offering Golden Visa as perks for new recruits in key roles”. Mr. Robin Philip, the founder, and director of A&A Associate, mentioned that while it remains a matter of huge pride for companies to have Golden Visa holders in their ranks, it also means long-term benefits in the form of reduced overall costs to the employer. With advantages like special insurance packages for Golden Visa holders, employers are more likely to consider applying for the visa for eligible staff.

excerpt.rendered: Good news for entrepreneurs in UAE – Attractive free zone offers to launch your business UAE free zones are …
